tool_description: The ultimate spelling checker for your text, ensuring error-free content every time. Unleash the power of multilingual spell-checking with our API.
name: SpellCheckPro
title: SpellCheckPro

api_list.name: SpellCheckProEndpoint
api_list.description:
The 

> /check_spelling

 endpoint is used to check the spelling of a given text. It takes a JSON object with a single property, text, which is a string of the text to be spell checked. The endpoint returns a JSON object with a single property, misspelled, which is an array of strings representing the misspelled words found in the input text. The endpoint supports specifying a language code("lang_code") as an optional query parameter to check the spelling for specific languages. Following lang_code are supported:

```
[‘sk_SK’, ‘zu’, ‘nb’, ‘ml’, ‘lv’, ‘sv’, ‘cs’, ‘nn’, ‘fa’, ‘pt_BR’, ‘de_DE’, ‘ku’, ‘ru’, ‘br’, ‘fr_CH’, ‘xh’, ‘he’, ‘sk’, ‘no’, ‘bg’, ‘el’, ‘sl’, ‘uz’, ‘is’, ‘af’, ‘tn’, ‘kk’, ‘ar’, ‘hr’, ‘or’, ‘pt_PT’, ‘fo’, ‘it’, ‘en_CA’, ‘en_US’, ‘en_AU’, ‘en’, ‘tl_PH’, ‘da’, ‘ta’, ‘tl’, ‘nr’, ‘eo’, ‘hsb’, ‘te’, ‘de_CH’, ‘hi’, ‘kn’, ‘ns’, ‘ca’, ‘hu’, ‘fr_FR’, ‘fr’, ‘mr’, ‘cy’, ‘ro’, ‘pl’, ‘ts’, ‘pa’, ‘gu’, ‘de’, ‘bn’, ‘es’, ‘de_AT’, ‘ss’, ‘uk’, ‘am’, ‘en_GB’, ‘et’, ‘lt’, ‘hy’, ‘gl’, ‘nl’, ‘st’, ‘id’, ‘ga’, ‘eu’]


```
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spellcheckpro.p.rapidapi.com/check_spelling"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spellcheckpro.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spellcheckpro.p.rapidapi.com/check_spelling"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spellcheckpro.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
